  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    akka.event.ActorClassification
    Use Managed ActorClassification instead. Since 2.4.
    akka.kernel.Bootable
    Microkernel is deprecated. Use ordinary main class instead. Since 2.4.
    akka.persistence.query.javadsl.CurrentEventsByTagQuery
    To be replaced by CurrentEventsByTagQuery2 from Akka 2.5. Since 2.4.11.
    akka.persistence.query.scaladsl.CurrentEventsByTagQuery
    To be replaced by CurrentEventsByTagQuery2 from Akka 2.5. Since 2.4.11.
    akka.persistence.query.javadsl.EventsByTagQuery
    To be replaced by EventsByTagQuery2 from Akka 2.5. Since 2.4.11.
    akka.persistence.query.scaladsl.EventsByTagQuery
    To be replaced by EventsByTagQuery2 from Akka 2.5. Since 2.4.11.
    akka.cluster.MetricsCollector
    Superseded by akka.cluster.metrics (in akka-cluster-metrics jar). Since 2.4.
    akka.cluster.routing.MetricsSelector
    Superseded by akka.cluster.metrics (in akka-cluster-metrics jar). Since 2.4.
    akka.persistence.PersistentView
    use Persistence Query instead. Since 2.4.
    akka.stream.stage.Stage
    Please use GraphStage instead. Since 2.4.2.

    Exceptions and Description
    akka.stream.BindFailedException$
    BindFailedException object will never be thrown. Match on the class instead. Since .
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    akka.actor.ActorRefFactory.actorFor(ActorPath)
    use actorSelection instead of actorFor. Since 2.2.

    use actorSelection instead of actorFor. Since 2.2.

    use actorSelection instead of actorFor. Since 2.2.

    use actorSelection instead of actorFor. Since 2.2.

    use actorSelection instead of actorFor. Since 2.2.

    use actorSelection instead of actorFor. Since 2.2.

    use actorSelection instead of actorFor. Since 2.2.

    use actorSelection instead of actorFor. Since 2.2.
    akka.actor.LocalActorRefProvider.actorFor(InternalActorRef, String)
    use actorSelection instead of actorFor. Since 2.2.
    akka.remote.RemoteActorRefProvider.actorFor(InternalActorRef, String)
    use actorSelection instead of actorFor. Since 2.2.
    akka.actor.ActorRefFactory.actorFor(Iterable<String>)
    use actorSelection instead of actorFor. Since 2.2.
    akka.actor.ActorRefFactory.actorFor(Iterable<String>)
    use actorSelection instead of actorFor. Since 2.2.
    akka.actor.ActorRefFactory.actorFor(String)
    use actorSelection instead of actorFor. Since 2.2.
    akka.remote.AddressUidExtension.addressUid()
    Use longAddressUid instead. Since 2.4.x.
    akka.pattern.PromiseActorRef$.apply(ActorRefProvider, Timeout, String)
    Use apply with messageClassName and sender parameters. Since 2.4.
    akka.pattern.PromiseActorRef.apply(ActorRefProvider, Timeout, String)
    Use apply with messageClassName and sender parameters. Since 2.4.
    akka.cluster.UniqueAddress$.apply(Address, int)
    Use Long UID apply instead. Since 2.4.11.
    akka.cluster.UniqueAddress.apply(Address, int)
    Use Long UID apply instead. Since 2.4.11.
    akka.remote.QuarantinedEvent$.apply(Address, int)
    Use long uid apply. Since .
    akka.remote.QuarantinedEvent.apply(Address, int)
    Use long uid apply. Since .
    akka.remote.serialization.ProtobufSerializer.ARRAY_OF_BYTE_ARRAY()
    Will be removed without replacement. Since 2.4.
    akka.actor.ActorSystem.awaitTermination()
    Use Await.result(whenTerminated, Duration.Inf) instead. Since 2.4.
    akka.actor.ActorSystem.awaitTermination(Duration)
    Use Await.result(whenTerminated, timeout) instead. Since 2.4.
    akka.remote.transport.netty.NettyTransportSettings.BindPortSelector()
    WARNING: This should only be used by professionals. Since 2.4.
    akka.cluster.UniqueAddress.copy(Address, int)
    Use Long UID constructor instead. Since 2.4.11.
    akka.remote.QuarantinedEvent.copy(Address, int)
    Use long uid copy method. Since .
    akka.remote.transport.AssociationHandle.disassociate()
    Use method that states reasons to make sure disassociation reasons are logged. Since 2.5.3.
    akka.cluster.ClusterSettings.DownRemovalMargin()
    Specific to AutoDown should not be used anywhere else, instead Cluster.downingProvider.downRemovalMargin should be used as it allows the downing provider to decide removal margins
    akka.actor.ActorPath$.ElementRegex()
    Use `isValidPathElement` instead. Since 2.3.8.
    akka.event.EventStream$.fromActorSystem(ActorSystem)
    Use explicit `system.eventStream` instead. Since 2.4.
    akka.event.EventStream.fromActorSystem(ActorSystem)
    Use explicit `system.eventStream` instead. Since 2.4.
    akka.stream.javadsl.FileIO$.fromFile(File)
    Use `fromPath` instead. Since 2.4.5.

    akka.stream.scaladsl.FileIO.fromFile(File, int)
    Use `fromPath` instead. Since 2.4.5.
    akka.routing.GroupBase.getPaths()
    Implement getPaths with ActorSystem parameter instead. Since 2.4.
    akka.persistence.fsm.PersistentFSMBase.initialize()
    Removed from API, called internally. Since 2.4.5.
    akka.actor.ActorRef.isTerminated()
    Use context.watch(actor) and receive Terminated(actor). Since 2.2.
    akka.actor.ActorSystem.isTerminated()
    Use the whenTerminated method instead. Since 2.4.

    Use context.watch(actor) and receive Terminated(actor). Since 2.2.

    akka.remote.RemoteActorRef.isTerminated()
    Use context.watch(actor) and receive Terminated(actor). Since 2.2.
    akka.routing.Pool.nrOfInstances()
    Implement nrOfInstances with ActorSystem parameter instead. Since 2.4.
    akka.routing.Group.paths()
    Implement paths with ActorSystem parameter instead. Since 2.4.
    akka.routing.GroupBase.paths()
    Use paths with ActorSystem parameter instead. Since 2.4.

    WARNING: This should only be used by professionals. Since 2.0.

    Use recoverWithRetries instead. Since 2.4.4.
    akka.actor.ActorSystem.shutdown()
    Use the terminate() method instead. Since 2.4.
